mapper.select: SELECT review.num, review.writer, review.subject, review.content_p, review.content_m, review.ip, review.accommodation, review.lodge_date, review.write_date, grade.clean, grade.comfortable, grade.location, grade.facilities, grade.kind, grade.value, grade.wifi FROM review join grade ON review.num = grade.review WHERE review.accommodation=#{accommodation}
select count(*) from review where accommodation=#{accommodation}
mapper.insert:
insert into review values(review_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{subject}, #{content_p}, #{content_m}, #{ip}, #{accommodation}, #{lodge_date}, sysdate)
select review_seq.currval from dual
